name: Fantastic Orc
description:
◆ Introduction
'Fantastic Orc' has visual novel elements that you can enjoy conversations with attractive female characters,
also this is a Hentai game that combines puzzle game elements that requires memorizing skill.
Become a rugged orc and destroy cute and sexy female characters.

◆ Gameplay
Match the same symbol for a limited time to see the View the story and animations.

◆ Game Features
◇ Visual novel and Puzzle game.
◇ The game text is 22,000 words.
◇ 5 characters
